apps.name: Jellyfin
apps.description: Serveur multim√©dia open-source pour vos films, s√©ries et musiques
apps.author: Jellyfin Team
apps.docker_compose:
version: '3.8'
services:
  jellyfin:
    image: jellyfin/jellyfin:latest
    container_name: jellyfin
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "8096:8096"
    volumes:
      - ./config:/config
      - ./cache:/cache
      - ./media:/media

apps.name: Nextcloud
apps.description: Suite compl√®te de cloud priv√© (fichiers, calendrier, contacts)
apps.author: Nextcloud GmbH
apps.docker_compose:
version: '3.8'
services:
  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud:latest
    container_name: nextcloud
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "8080:80"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/var/www/html
    environment:
      - MYSQL_HOST=db
      - MYSQL_DATABASE=nextcloud
      - MYSQL_USER=nextcloud
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD=secure_password

environment_variables.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
environment_variables.description: Nom de la base de donn√©es
